tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MealPlanner (
    meal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meal_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    meal_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    calories INT NOT NULL,
    protein_g FLOAT NOT NULL,
    carbs_g FLOAT NOT NULL,
    fats_g FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE MealPlan (
    meal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meal_name VARCHAR(255),
    meal_description TEXT,
    meal_type ENUM('Breakfast', 'Lunch', 'Dinner'),
    calories_per_serving INT
);

CREATE TABLE NutritionalRecommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age_range VARCHAR(50),
    gender ENUM('Male', 'Female'),
    min_calories_per_day INT,
    max_calories_per_day INT,
    vitamin_requirements TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE meal_plans (
    meal_plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    meal_plan_name VARCHAR(255),
    total_calories INT,
    total_protein INT,
    total_carbs INT,
    total_fat INT
);

CREATE TABLE meals (
    meal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meal_name VARCHAR(255),
    calories INT,
    protein INT,
    carbs INT,
    fat INT,
    meal_plan_id UUID REFERENCES meal_plans(meal_plan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    weight_kg FLOAT,
    height_cm INT,
    daily_calorie_goal INT
);

CREATE TABLE meals (
  meal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  meal_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  calories INTEGER,
  proteins INTEGER,
  carbs INTEGER,
  fats INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INTEGER,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  weight INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE User_Profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT,
    activity_level VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Meal_Ingredients (
    meal_id INT,
    ingredient_id INT,
    serving_size INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_meal FOREIGN KEY (meal_id) REFERENCES Meal_Plans(meal_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_ingredient FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES Ingredients(ingredient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE User_Meal_Logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    meal_id INT,
    date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES User_Profiles(user_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_meal FOREIGN KEY (meal_id) REFERENCES Meal_Plans(meal_id)
);
